Articles.Content:
the title says it all...

connect to TWO asteroids and return to kerbin

the bigger the better

how many can you take? 2? 3? 5?

stock only

you can refuel up to 5 times

screenshots/video is required

hard mode: no parts from NASA and only 3 refuels... the ARM I ok because it is required.

are you up for the challenge?
